author: rooneg
msg: Add doxygen docs to the website, so they can easily be checked out on
the ASF servers, which don't have doxygen installed.  This is what the
other doxygen using ASF projects I've found seem to do to work around
* Makefile.am: copy the generated HTML from the doxygen directory into

author: tschlabach
msg: Added a RelaxNG schema for the links resource type (formerly known as doctype) to be able to edit with the One Form Editor among other

author: tschlabach
msg: Fixed the bug that after RelaxNG validation errors, the original document was displayed again with the user's changes lost. Added some comments and applied some formatting.

author: gdamour
msg: add two new general option switches:
o syserr: dump the errors to syserr if set to true; and
o verbose: dump the stack-trace of the returned exceptions if set to true.
The default value of these two switches is false. This avoids long pages
